sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: The GIMP package contains gimp, escputil, gimp-config and gimp-remote.

sect3.title: gimp
sect3.para: gimp is an image manipulation program. It works with a variety of image formats and provides a large selection of tools.

sect3.title: escputil
sect3.para: escputil is a utility to perform maintenance tasks on an Epson Stylus inkjet printer.

sect3.title: gimp-config
sect3.para: gimp-config is used by other programs that want to link to GIMP libraries.

sect3.title: gimp-remote
sect3.para: gimp-remote is a small utility that tells a running gimp to open a local or remote image file.
